headline: Realty Income (O): Does New £900M Sterling Loan Change the Valuation Story?
summary: Realty Income (O) just closed a sizable £900 million unsecured term loan in Sterling, aiming to repay outstanding credit facility borrowings and get ahead of an upcoming loan maturity through proactive refinancing. The company also secured a fixed 4.3% interest rate with swaps, providing greater predictability for its financing costs. See our latest analysis for Realty Income. Realty Income’s recent steps to lock in financing have caught investor attention, but the stock has seen fading...
